flavor: "Did you ever notice how everything goes in cycles? The stuff that's cool now was cool before. That's why I keep copy of everything!" -Princess Space Kitten
printed_text: When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Trope. [click], remove Trope from the game: Shuffle 1 card from your heap into your stack for each power counter on Trope.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Trope. click, remove Trope from the game: Shuffle 1 card from your heap into your stack for each power counter on Trope.

flavor: Don't you hate it when you know everything before it's even out?
printed_text: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, they trash the top card of R&D.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, they trash the top card of R&D.

flavor: "Just a bunch of knockoffs for the touristos. The real designer stuff isn't sold on the street."
printed_text:
When your turn begins, lose 1[credit].
When the Corp's turn begins, draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, lose 1 credit. When the Corp's turn begins, draw 1 card.

flavor: "I told you to lose my number!"
printed_text:
When you install Rolodex, look at the top 5 cards of your stack and arrange them in any order.
When Rolodex is trashed, trash the top 3 cards of your stack.
stripped_printed_text: When you install Rolodex, look at the top 5 cards of your stack and arrange them in any order. When Rolodex is trashed, trash the top 3 cards of your stack.

flavor: Your life is not your own, once you become famous on the Net.
printed_text: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, add Fan Site to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, add Fan Site to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points.

flavor: "My gerbil could write a better screenplay."
printed_text:
Film Critic can host a single agenda.
Whenever you access an agenda, you may host that agenda on Film Critic (the agenda is no longer being accessed and is uninstalled).
[click],[click]: Add an agenda hosted on Film Critic to your score area.
stripped_printed_text: Film Critic can host a single agenda. Whenever you access an agenda, you may host that agenda on Film Critic (the agenda is no longer being accessed and is uninstalled). click,click: Add an agenda hosted on Film Critic to your score area.

flavor: "Yeah, we know right where she is. Just pull up Sizzler!"
printed_text:
You are tagged.
Prevent all meat damage.
stripped_printed_text: You are tagged. Prevent all meat damage.

flavor: "It's our most pirated property ever. Great work, everyone."
printed_text: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including this asset), they lose [click].
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including this asset), they lose click.

printed_text: As an additional cost to rez this ice, forfeit 1 agenda. Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed console. [subroutine] Trash all installed virtual resources.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to rez this ice, forfeit 1 agenda. Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Do 1 core damage. Subroutine Trash 1 installed console. Subroutine Trash all installed virtual resources.

printed_text:
Whenever this ice is exposed, do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards. Trash this ice.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever this ice is exposed, do 2 net damage. Subroutine The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards. Trash this ice.

printed_text: Choose a central server. The Runner may run that server. They cannot jack out during that run. If no run is made this way, add this operation to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
stripped_printed_text: Choose a central server. The Runner may run that server. They cannot jack out during that run. If no run is made this way, add this operation to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

printed_text: The Runner cannot steal more than one agenda each turn.
stripped_printed_text: The Runner cannot steal more than one agenda each turn.

printed_text:
While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this agenda, you may place up to 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.
stripped_printed_text: While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this agenda, you may place up to 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.

flavor: It's like Lethal Action 3, only with more explosions.
printed_text:
While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this agenda, you may gain 5[credit].
stripped_printed_text: While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this agenda, you may gain 5 credits.

printed_text: When your turn begins, you may pay 1[credit]. If you do, place 1 advancement counter on a card you can advance in the root of a server.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may pay 1 credit. If you do, place 1 advancement counter on a card you can advance in the root of a server.

printed_text: Install 1 agenda from HQ faceup and host this operation on that agenda as a condition counter with "Whenever the Runner accesses host agenda, they take 2 tags."
stripped_printed_text: Install 1 agenda from HQ faceup and host this operation on that agenda as a condition counter with "Whenever the Runner accesses host agenda, they take 2 tags."

printed_text: Persistent â†’ The Runner cannot steal agendas from this server or its root. Ignore this ability for any agenda the Runner has a copy of in their score area. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.) Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: Persistent -> The Runner cannot steal agendas from this server or its root. Ignore this ability for any agenda the Runner has a copy of in their score area. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.) Limit 1 region per server.

printed_text:
Install Hollywood Renovation faceup.
Whenever you advance Hollywood Renovation, you may place 1 advancement token on another card that can be advanced (or 2 advancement tokens instead if there are 6 or more advancement tokens on Hollywood Renovation).
stripped_printed_text: Install Hollywood Renovation faceup. Whenever you advance Hollywood Renovation, you may place 1 advancement token on another card that can be advanced (or 2 advancement tokens instead if there are 6 or more advancement tokens on Hollywood Renovation).

flavor: Sometimes corps have to bury projects, but that doesn't mean they can't make a profit on them.
printed_text: Choose 1 card in the root of a remote server. Gain 3[credit] for each advancement counter on that card, then trash it.
stripped_printed_text: Choose 1 card in the root of a remote server. Gain 3 credits for each advancement counter on that card, then trash it.

flavor:
EXT. KANSAS - DAY
DOROTHY (Miranda) gazes out at the horizon. A sudden gust of wind catches her hair. Above the windblasted prairie loom ominous STORM CLOUDS.
DOROTHY: If only I wasn't in Kansas anymore.
She begins to hum a haunting melody.
